Summary: looked like a bright white light that didnt move, like a really bright star. looked like a lightbulb
trends: There have been 12 other sightings in Del Rio
There were no other sightings in Del Rio on or around June 5th 2008
divs: Sighting DetailsI was at my mothers house in del rio texas, around 1:20-1:30am i got a call from my gf and went outside to smoke a cigarette. i walked outside and could see sumthing really bright from the corner of my eye. it looked like a really bright, white in color, star. it sort of had the shape of a light bulb..and sumtimes looked as if it was 2 lights really close to eachother. i tried to record it on my phone but it wasnt able to catch a good video of it, so i took pictures of it on my cell phone. i took pictures of the normal stars and you couldnt see them on my phone but when i took pictures of the bright light, you could see it on my phone. it looks like a bright white dot. i went inside to tell my brother what he thought of it and he came out with his digital camera and took a couple of pictures as well. then we went inside for about 20-30 minutes untill i went back outside to smoke another cigarette and noticed it was no longer in the sky. i kind of had a shockin sensation when i noticed that it was no longer there. i have about 8 pictures i took on my phone. i was lookin towards the direction of eagle pass tx., wich is south of del rio tx, and the location i was was on top of a hill with not many city lights so i doubt that could be an answer to the light in the sky but thought that it might be a sattelite.
